Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete CryptoSense Analytics Platform documentation

This commit includes comprehensive project documentation for the CryptoSense Analytics Platform (Coinsphere), an AI-powered crypto portfolio tracker with market predictions and risk scoring.

## Documentation Added:

### Strategy & Planning (8 documents)
- Product Strategy: Retail analytics focus, target market, pricing tiers
- Business Requirements Document: Detailed feature requirements & success metrics
- Financial Model: Revenue projections, unit economics, 3-year forecast
- Alignment Summary: Strategic decision documentation
- Development Roadmap: 8-week sprint plan with milestones
- Go-to-Market Plan: 12-month marketing strategy ($85K budget)
- Project Kickoff Summary: Master overview tying all documents together

### Technical Documentation (5 documents)
- System Architecture: Tech stack, microservices design, data flow
- API Specification: REST endpoints, WebSocket feeds, data models
- Implementation Guide: Development environment setup, deployment
- Testing Strategy: Unit/integration/E2E testing approach
- Security & Compliance: GDPR/CCPA compliance, encryption, incident response

### DevOps & Operations (2 documents)
- DevOps Infrastructure Guide: CI/CD, monitoring, scaling, disaster recovery
- Support & Operations Playbook: Support channels, SLAs, runbooks

### Design & UX (4 documents)
- Front-End Specification: 12-section UX spec with personas, wireframes, flows
- Figma Setup Guide: Design system creation (8-12 hours)
- Storybook Setup Guide: Component library implementation (4-6 hours)
- Data Privacy Policy: GDPR/CCPA compliant privacy policy

### BMad Framework
- BMad Method integration: AI agents, task templates, workflows
- Agents: UX Expert, Architect, PM, QA, Dev, PO
- Tasks: Document creation, elicitation methods, story generation
- Templates: PRD, architecture, front-end spec, story templates

## Key Highlights:
- 15 comprehensive documents covering strategy, technical, design, operations
- AI-powered predictions with 70%+ accuracy target
- Degen Risk Scores (0-100 scale) for asset evaluation
- 8-week MVP development timeline
- $420K ARR target by Month 12
- React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Shadcn/ui tech stack
- PostgreSQL + TimescaleDB + Redis data layer
- AWS infrastructure for production

## Tech Stack:
- Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui, Recharts
- Backend: Node.js 20, Express, Python 3.11, FastAPI
- Database: PostgreSQL 15, TimescaleDB, Redis 7
- ML/AI: PyTorch 2.0, scikit-learn, LSTM models
- Infrastructure: AWS ECS/RDS/ElastiCache, GitHub Actions CI/CD
